examples.sentence: Negative form - ない form conjugation

sections.heading: What is 〜なきゃ?
sections.content:
〜なきゃ is the casual contraction of なければならない, meaning "must," "gotta," or "have to." It's very common in everyday speech.

行かなきゃ "Gotta go" / "I must go" 勉強しなきゃ "Gotta study" / "I must study"

children.heading: From なければならない to なきゃ
children.content:
Full form: 行かなければならない ↓ Short form: 行かなくちゃならない ↓ Casual: 行かなきゃならない ↓ Very casual: 行かなきゃ

| Verb | Negative | なきゃ | | ------ | -------- | ---------- | | 行く | 行かない | 行かなきゃ | | 食べる | 食べない | 食べなきゃ | | する | しない | しなきゃ | | 来る | 来ない | 来なきゃ |

children.heading: Common in daily conversation
children.content: もう行かなきゃ "I gotta go now" 宿題しなきゃ "Gotta do homework" 早く寝なきゃ "Gotta sleep soon" 頑張らなきゃ "Gotta work hard"

children.heading: なきゃ (most casual)
children.content: 行かなきゃ "Gotta go"

children.heading: なくちゃ (casual)
children.content: 行かなくちゃ "Gotta go"

children.heading: なければ (neutral)
children.content: 行かなければ "I must go" (incomplete sentence)

children.heading: なければならない (formal)
children.content: 行かなければならない "I must go"

children.heading: なきゃだめ (must, or it's bad)
children.content: 今日中に終わらせなきゃだめ "I must finish it today" 薬を飲まなきゃだめだよ "You gotta take your medicine"

children.heading: なきゃいけない (must/have to)
children.content: 早く起きなきゃいけない "I have to wake up early" 謝らなきゃいけないと思う "I think I have to apologize"

children.heading: Example 1: Leaving
children.content: A: もう12時だよ "It's already 12" B: え！本当？帰らなきゃ "What! Really? I gotta go home" A: じゃあね "See you"

children.heading: Example 2: Homework
children.content: A: 遊びに行かない？ "Wanna go out?" B: 行きたいけど、宿題しなきゃ "I want to, but I gotta do homework" A: そっか。頑張ってね "I see. Good luck"

children.heading: Example 3: Work
children.content: A: もう遅いよ "It's already late" B: 分かってる。でも、今日中に終わらせなきゃ "I know. But I gotta finish it today"

children.heading: Adding time expressions
children.content: もう行かなきゃ "I gotta go now" すぐ出なきゃ "Gotta leave right away" 急がなきゃ "Gotta hurry"

sections.heading: Self-Reminders
sections.content:
Often used when talking to yourself:

忘れないようにしなきゃ "I gotta make sure not to forget" もっと頑張らなきゃ "I gotta try harder" 早く起きなきゃ "I gotta wake up early"

children.heading: Daily obligations
children.content: 行かなきゃ - gotta go やらなきゃ - gotta do 勉強しなきゃ - gotta study 寝なきゃ - gotta sleep 食べなきゃ - gotta eat

children.heading: Work/School
children.content: 働かなきゃ - gotta work 準備しなきゃ - gotta prepare 間に合わせなきゃ - gotta make it in time

children.heading: Social
children.content: 連絡しなきゃ - gotta contact 謝らなきゃ - gotta apologize 会わなきゃ - gotta meet

sections.heading: Trailing Off
sections.content:
Often ends sentences without completion:

そろそろ行かなきゃ... "I should probably get going..." 勉強しなきゃな... "I should study..." 準備しなきゃなぁ "I gotta prepare..."

children.heading: なきゃね (acknowledgment)
children.content: 頑張らなきゃね "Gotta work hard, right?" 早く寝なきゃね "Gotta sleep early, huh"

children.heading: なきゃな (self-reminder)
children.content: もっと運動しなきゃな "Gotta exercise more" 節約しなきゃな "Gotta save money"

children.heading: なきゃよ (emphasis)
children.content: 今日中にやらなきゃよ "You gotta do it today"

children.heading: なきゃいけなかった
children.content: もっと早く起きなきゃいけなかった "I should have woken up earlier" 勉強しなきゃいけなかったのに "I should have studied, but..."

children.heading: なきゃだめ？
children.content: 今日やらなきゃだめ？ "Do I have to do it today?" 全部食べなきゃだめ？ "Do I have to eat everything?"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using in formal situations
children.content: Wrong context: 先生に「行かなきゃ」 ⚠️ Better: 「行かなければなりません」 ✓ なきゃ is too casual for formal situations!

children.heading: Mistake 2: Wrong negative form
children.content: Wrong: 行くなきゃ ❌ Right: 行かなきゃ ✓ Must use negative stem!

children.heading: Mistake 3: Overusing with superiors
children.content: Too casual: 部長、もう帰らなきゃ ⚠️ Better: すみません、もう失礼します ✓

sections.heading: Comparison with Similar Forms
sections.content: | Expression | Formality | Usage | | ---------------- | ----------- | --------------- | | なければならない | Formal | Written, formal | | なければいけない | Neutral | Standard | | なくちゃならない | Casual | Conversation | | なくちゃいけない | Casual | Conversation | | なきゃならない | Casual | Conversation | | なきゃいけない | Casual | Conversation | | なきゃ | Very casual | Daily speech | | なくちゃ | Very casual | Daily speech |

children.heading: Basic
children.content: もう行かなきゃ "Gotta go now" 早く寝なきゃ "Gotta sleep soon" 宿題しなきゃ "Gotta do homework"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 明日早いから、もう寝なきゃ "I have to get up early tomorrow, so I gotta sleep" ダイエット中だから、食べ過ぎちゃいけないんだ。我慢しなきゃ "I'm on a diet, so I can't eat too much. Gotta resist" 約束したから、行かなきゃいけないんだよね "I made a promise, so I have to go"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: もっと真剣に将来のこと考えなきゃいけないと思う "I think I need to think more seriously about my future" このままじゃだめだ。変わらなきゃ "This won't do. I gotta change" みんなに迷惑かけちゃった。謝らなきゃな "I caused trouble for everyone. I gotta apologize"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜なければならない - Must (formal) 〜ないといけない - Have to 〜なくちゃ - Gotta (casual) 〜べき - Should 〜ほうがいい - Had better Negative form - ない form conjugation
